text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! aisee cheezon ke vishay mein na poochho ki ve yadi tum par spasht kar dee jaen, to tumhen booree lagen. yadi tum unhen aise samay mein poochhoge, jabaki quraan avatarit ho raha hai, to ve tumapar spasht kar dee jaengee. allaah ne use kshama kar diya. allaah bahut kshama karanevaala, sahanasheel hai
